title: Experience
subtitle: Work, Internship and Volunteership
description: I have worked with many evolving startups as ML and DL Developer,Web Designer and Software Architect. I have also worked with some well established companies mostly as AI Developer. I love organising events and that is why I am also involved with many opensource communities as a representative.

experiences.title: Website and ML Developer
experiences.description: I have also worked on implementation of algorithms for Face Detection, Text extraction from Image. I was involved in a team for creating complete software architecure of mobile and web application as well as admin panel for company.

experiences.title: Website Design
experiences.description: I have the hotel booking system designed for booking the room and used to view the customer different type of food.I learnt the Design thinking of UI on perspective of People.

experiences.title: Data Science Research Intern
experiences.description: I have worked on project of deep search image to check the usibility for all image for e-commerce purpose ,for security case.
